resources.string: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

Pangan Kita is an innovative application designed to connect consumers directly with farmers, eliminating the need for intermediaries. This platform aims to empower local farmers by providing them with direct access to a broader market, while enabling consumers to purchase fresh agricultural products at more affordable prices. Through Pangan Kita, farmers can sell their produce directly to consumers, removing middlemen who typically take a significant share of the profits, ensuring farmers receive a fairer price for their hard work.
